entry.title: Guglielmo Zuelli (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that composer Guglielmo Zuelli (pictured), a former director of the Palermo Conservatory, spent time in prison before the age of eight?

entry.title: Tournament of Kings (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Tournament of Kings made its host the United States' biggest buyer of Cornish game hens in 2018?

entry.title: Hana-Rawhiti Maipi-Clarke (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that if James Stuart-Wortley had not falsified his age for the 1853 general election, Hana-Rawhiti Maipi-Clarke would now be New Zealand's youngest-ever member of parliament?

entry.title: Mê Linh Square (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the statue of Trần Hưng Đạo in Mê Linh Square was erected by the South Vietnamese Navy, who regarded him as a patron saint?

entry.title: Saw Maha-Rit (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that Hanthawaddy royal Saw Maha-Rit was executed for leaving behind his wife Princess Tala Mi Kyaw on the battlefield?

entry.title: Wiseman (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that although Quentin Tarantino thought "Wiseman" was "fantastic", he could not find a scene for it in his film Django Unchained?

entry.title: Oliver C. Dawson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that in 1974, Oliver C. Dawson was the first black person to be inducted into the South Carolina Athletic Hall of Fame?

entry.title: The Sims 2: Apartment Life (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that The Sims 2: Apartment Life is not about apartment life?
